description:
Kaede`s coworker struggles to invite Kaede over for dinner. The gang throws Dino a birthday party. Later, Dino and guest stars solve an egg-citing mystery.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: It Eats More Than Just Ramen / Time for a Birthday Party!
Ramen Igai mo Taberu yo / Birthday Party Da yo!
ラーメン以外も食べるよ / バースデーパーティーだよ!
